about_the_game:
Overview

Mutant super soldiers have brought humanity to the brink of destruction through a campaign of brutal mutilation and rampant human breeding. It's up to Layla to protect the chastity of her and allies and bring peace back to Earth!

Collect a wide arsenal of futuristic weapons, then run and gun your way through hordes of enemies mowing down everything in sight! Fall pray to the lustious enemies however, and scenes of torment and pleasure await you...

Story

The year is 2X45. A man-made race of mutant super soldiers known as "Neo-Humanoids" turn on their creators, and mankind now faces annihilation. Bio-engineered to be ultimate warriors, the combat hardiness and might of these creatures was unmatched. That was until, in humanities darkest hour, a sliver of hope emerged.

Commander Layla and her elite squad known as the SSS strike a series of critical blows to the mutant army. In response, the Neo-Humanoids began developing their own new artificial soldiers designed to hunt humans and use their bodies as spawning vessels. Undeterred, Layla presses forward with her assault into mutant territory hell-bent on putting a stop to their destruction and depravity once and for all!


Who knows what bodily horrors await Layla deep in the infested halls of the neo-humanoid laboratory...

Combat


Choose a load-out from a wide rage of machine guns, shotguns, lasers, and homing missiles, grenades and rockets...Then drop in, shoot 'em full a holes, fill em full of lead, and explode them all into a thousand pieces!

Take cover around corners, use your dodge ability, and stay healthy armed and dangerous by picking up power-ups. These range from bomb ammo and new weapons, to heath kits and even a temporary infinite ammo and bomb boost!

Features

-Satisfying non-stop trigger happy run and gun game-play
-30 stages total including a last boss battle, and score ranking for each stage
-Adjustable difficulty
-Nearly (but not quite) 100 different weapons to collect and use!

name: Womb Defense Force

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Run and gun your way deep into the neo-humanoid territory and save mankind from its own creation! Fight as special ops commander Layla in this mutant blasting weapon rich 2D action sci-fi shooter!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
